cause.description:
We've drilled a well and built a school in Wunlang, in a remote part of Southern Sudan. We have two projects pending in Warrap State, have the land donated for an orphanage for the street children of Aweil, and have a vision of a multi-purpose community center in Wunlang Payam.
1. Everyone has a right to education.
2. The people of South Sudan have a right to determine their own future.
cause.mission: To provide education and opportunity to remote villages in South Sudan.
cause.name: Village Help for South Sudan
